alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...An outflow boundary will impact portions of southern Bureau and Putnam Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from 8 miles south of Earlville to near Princeton. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hennepin, Spring Valley, Granville, Dalzell and McNabb. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 60 and 72. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
